turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! What can I get started for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a Caffè Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a preference on milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add any sugar or other sweeteners?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add sugar. And I'll also have whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will this drink be iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, so I got a Grande Caffe Latte with 2% milk, added sugar and whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! May I ask the location you'd like to pick this up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to pick it up at the Starbucks at the Hotel Whitcomb, 1231 Market Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's in San Fran, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Give me a moment to send over your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All done!, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great you have a great day.
